001package net.tvburger.jdl.adaline;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.SyntheticDataSets;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetworks;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Trainer;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.Objectives;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.ChainedRegime;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
012
013import java.util.Arrays;
014
015public class AdalineLineMain {
016
017    public static void main(String[] args) {
018        SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<Float> syntheticDataSet = SyntheticDataSets.line(2, 3, JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT);
019        DataSet<Float> dataSet = syntheticDataSet.load();
020        DataSet<Float> trainingSet = dataSet.subset(10, dataSet.size());
021        DataSet<Float> testSet = dataSet.subset(0, 10);
022
023        Adaline adaline = Adaline.create(1, 1);
024        ObjectiveFunction<Float> objective = Objectives.mSE(JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT);
025        LeastMeanSquares leastMeanSquares = new LeastMeanSquares(0.001f);
026        ChainedRegime regime = Regimes.epochs(100).dumpNodes().reportObjective().stochastic();
027        Trainer<Adaline, Float> adalineTrainer = Trainer.of(new AdalineInitializer(), objective, leastMeanSquares, regime);
028        adalineTrainer.train(adaline, trainingSet);
029        NeuralNetworks.dump(adaline);
030
031        for (DataSet.Sample<Float> sample : testSet) {
032            Float[] estimate = adaline.estimate(sample.features());
033            System.out.println("with noise = " + Arrays.toString(sample.targetOutputs()) + " estimated = " + Arrays.toString(estimate) + " real = " + Arrays.toString(syntheticDataSet.getEstimationFunction().estimate(sample.features())));
034        }
035    }
036
037}
